name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
documents: Aadhaar Card, Landholding papers, Bank account details.

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
benefit: Insurance cover against crop failure due to natural calamities.
eligibility: All farmers who have taken loans or who opt-in.
documents: Land records, Bank passbook, Aadhaar card.

name: Mahatma Jyotirao Phule Shetkari Karjmukti Yojana
benefit: Loan waiver for farmers with loans up to ₹2 lakh.
eligibility: Farmers in Maharashtra with specified short-term crop loans.
documents: Aadhaar Card, Bank loan documents, Ration card.

name: Mukhyamantri Krishi Ashirwad Yojana
benefit: ₹5,000 per acre for farmers with up to 5 acres of land.
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers of Jharkhand.
documents: Aadhaar Card, Land records, Bank details.

name: Farm Mechanization Scheme
benefit: Subsidy on purchase of tractors, rotavators, and other farm equipment.
documents: Land records (7/12 extract), Aadhaar Card, Quotation of machinery.
